lead_paragraph: The Organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons said the achievement was “a major milestone” toward eradicating the weapons.

headline.print_headline: Monitors Report a 90% Decline in Stockpiles of Chemical Arms
headline.main: Chemical Weapon Stockpiles Greatly Reduced, Treaty Group Reports

snippet: The Organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons said the achievement was “a major milestone” toward eradicating the weapons.
abstract: Organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons reports 90 percent decline in stockpiles of chemical arms over last two decades.
